product_name: Michelin Pro4 Comp Service Course Foldable Tire - 700 x 23
long_description: Michelin Pro4 Comp Service Course foldable bike tire is built for rolling efficiency and cornering performance, thanks to a lightweight, supple casing and strategic compound use. 150 tpi casing allows for an efficient contact patch and low weight, improving rolling efficiency. High-density, puncture-resistant nylon belting behind the center tread helps deter flats. Dual-compound tread is firmer along the center for increased longevity, with the shoulders getting a softer compound for excellent cornering. Recommended pressure for theMichelin Pro4 Comp Service Course foldable clincher bike tire is 87 - 116 psi (6 - 8 BAR).
short_description: Michelin Pro4 Comp Service Course foldable bike tire is built for rolling efficiency and cornering performance, thanks to a lightweight, supple casing and strategic compound use.
